Nah the rioter explained it well imo.
it means you have to earn 20 gold EXTRA across 6 rounds, i.e a stage. So for example, say I'm on 40 gold on round 3.1. That means at the end of combat I'll receive the baseline 5 gold plus an EXTRA 4 gold from interest (+ whatever from win/loss). Then I'll get an another EXTRA 4 gold at the end of round 3.2, so on and so forth until the end of round 3.6. Add up that EXTRA gold you've earnt across rounds 3.1-3.6 and if it comes to 20 or more you get the mission complete.
Hope this helps!
